channel.title: Posts on Mariela M. Villarreal
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Mariela M. Villarreal

item.title: Fun (?) Facts About Me
item.description: Here are some fun facts about me! Who am I? Height: 5'1" Hometown: Laredo, Texas I hate spiders, but I force myself to watch the movie Arachnophobia every year. I was a swimmer in high school. My events were the 500 m freestyle and the 100 m backstroke. If I had three wishes, I would wish for the chance to go back in time and see Prince in concert, to have a pet sloth, and have to infinitely more wishes.

item.title: My First Blog Post!!
item.description: Hello!! This is my first official blog post, and I am going to use it to show off a little bit. Throughout this class, I learned how to use R, and I loved it. Towards, the end of class, we learned Python. Although, I personally enjoy R more than Python, we can actually use both of these programs at the same time, which is awesome! In the R chuck below, I'm going to be maniupulating some data from the "movies6" dataset from my second project.
